actions.description: The hollow dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, and it can use Sapping Presence.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Each creature of the hollow dragon's choice within 60 feet of it must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this hollow dragon's Sapping Presence for 24 hours.
actions.name: Sapping Presence

actions.description: The hollow dragon exhales radiant flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The hollow dragon makes one Claw attack.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The hollow dragon creates ethereal bindings around a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of the dragon's next turn.
actions.name: Ghostly Binding (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from the hollow dragon's frame. Each creature within 10 feet of the hollow dragon must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Booming Scales (Costs 3 Actions)

conditionImmunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned
name: Hollow Dragon

specialTraits.description: If the hollow dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: When the hollow dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, its body breaks into nine pieces: two arms, two legs, two wings, a tail, a torso, and a head. Each piece is a Large object with AC 19, 27 hit points, and immunity to psychic and poison damage. After 1d6 days, if all pieces are still within 6 miles of each other, they all teleport to the location of the head piece and merge with it, whereupon the hollow dragon regains all its hit points and becomes active again.
specialTraits.name: Reconstruction
